job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description:
Responsibilities

  • Work on a cross-functional team including Data Scientists, Product Managers, Engineers, and marketing leads across the organization.
  • Build scalable tools to measure transactional data trends and risk measurements. Develop algorithms and experiments to minimize merchant default risk and to forecast cash flow demand.
  • Create and maintain data pipelines, dashboards, and data models around our communications ecosystem. Identify and own data latency and data quality issues.
  • Pull data and conduct product analysis to discover and suggest new product functionality and optimize existing services and systems.
  • Prototyping new features and building new ideas by writing code in Python.
  • Implement new approaches in collaboration with software engineers in production (Python, Ruby on Rails, Golang and others).


Requirements

Required Skills: Python, Jupyter, Pandas

Nice to have Skills: SQL

Additional Requirements

This job requires the candidate to be onsite in Chicago for 1-3 months with the option to work fully remotely afterward.
